message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget. While I believe $14,000 accurately reflects the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still aiming to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $12,500?
